info.title: Apache StreamPark Open API
info.description: Apache StreamPark Open API for third-party system integration

parameters.name: savePointed
parameters.description: restored app from the savepoint or latest checkpoint

parameters.name: allowNonRestored
parameters.description: ignore savepoint if cannot be restored

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number of log lines loaded at once

alertType.description: base type, email 1, dink-talk 2, we-com 4, http callback 8, lark 16, also choose a combination, e.g. 3 means email + dink-talk

contacts.description: phone numbers, use ',' to split multiple phone numbers

requestTemplate.description: use freemarker template replace the parameters
